title: 05/07/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Heller
itunes:title: 05/07/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Heller
description:
Mike Heller talks to Dan about the Aaron Rodgers news and how it is affecting the local news in Wisconsin. Mike says he thinks reconciliation is the best remedy between Rodgers and the Green Bay Packers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
